TopicTitle: Engines and RCS malfunction in the VAB and show their exhaust in two directions. Any help?

Articles.Content:
So, I restarted KSP today, but now the engines are bugging out and, well, it's hard for me to explain, but here is the [picture](https://www.dropbox.com/s/7njvnz0i32i83jp/screenshot6744.png?dl=0)...

Thanks for answering my problems, 

Astrofox
Please follow the directions in the stickied thread; clearly something is dying with an exception, but without the (correct) log, and a list of mods, we won't know what.
I do not know what is it.
